attributes.action: Fly the Union Flag at Belfast City Hall 365 days a year
attributes.additional_details: For over 100 years the Union Flag has flown above Belfast City Hall. On the 3rd December local politicians voted to either keep it, remove it or fly it on designated days only. This decision has outraged the Unionist people of Northern Ireland. Northern Ireland is part of the UK and the union flag should not offend. Please sign to get the Union Flag back up all year round.
